issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KS, Base UI>Modal Windows, I was able to get the UI out of sync with the device. This initially resulted in a smaller "landscape-style" navbar, but an additional device rotation had the status bar rotate alone.

See images for details.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Navigate to Base UI>Modal Windows
3) set picker to "Flip horizontal"
4) Click "show modal"
5) Rotate to landscape
6) Close the modal window
7) Rotate again

Result:
On modal close, the navbar will be small with some whitespace below. When rotated as in step 7, the status bar will rotate, but the rest of the UI will not.

Expected:
UI remains in sync with device

Note:
Did not occur with iOS 4.3.x or 1.7.2 SDK
fields.summary: Kitchensink: Base UI>Modal Windows, Navbar and status bar can get out of sync with UI
fields.environment: Mac OS X 10.6.8, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535, SDK 1.7.3.v20110928143011, iPhone 4, iOS 5.0

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
